pkgmetadata.longdescription: BMI for Python==============Python bindings for the CSDMS `Basic Model Interface <https://bmi-spec.readthedocs.io>`_.Install-------Install *bmipy* with *pip*,.. code-block:: bash $ pip install bmipyIf you're using Anaconda, you can also install *bmipy*with conda from the *conda-forge* channel,.. code-block:: bash $ conda install bmipy -c conda-forgeTo build and install *bmipy* from source,.. code-block:: bash $ git clone https://github.com/csdms/bmi-python $ cd bmi-python $ pip install .Usage-----.. code-block:: python from bmipy import Bmi class MyBmi(Bmi): def initialize(self, config_file): # Your implementation goes hereA complete sample implementation is given in thehttps://github.com/csdms/bmi-example-pythonrepository.
